description:
Vegapunk Shaka shares with Robin and the others his theory about an ancient kingdom and the 100-Year Void. He even says that he visited Ohara after its destruction. Meanwhile, Luffy and Chopper try to activate the giant robot and something surprising happens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Forbidden Piece of History! A Theory Concerning a Kingdom
Die verbotene Geschichte! – Eine Hypothese über ein gewisses Königreich
Kinjirareta Rekishi! Aru Oukoku no Kasetsu
L`histoire censurée. La thèse d`un royaume oublié !
جزء محرّم من التّاريخ! نظريّة عن مملكة معيّنة!
禁じられた歴史! ある王国の仮説
